# AVVideoH264EntropyModeKey

**Global Variable**

The entropy encoding mode for H.264 compression.

## Declaration

```swift
let AVVideoH264EntropyModeKey: String
```

## Discussion

This property controls whether an H.264 encoder uses [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoH264EntropyModeCAVLC] or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoH264EntropyModeCABAC]. CABAC generally gives better compression at the expense of higher computational overhead.



## Entropy mode

- **AVVideoH264EntropyModeCABAC**: The encoder uses Context-based Adaptive Binary Arithmetic Coding.
- **AVVideoH264EntropyModeCAVLC**: The encoder uses Context-based Adaptive Variable Length Coding.
